doc:
Géraldine Pailhas https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/G%C3%A9raldine_Pailhas 0 Géraldine Pailhas (born 8 January 1971) is a French actress. She had her first international success in 1995 as Doña Anna, the unfulfilled love of Johnny Depp in the comedy Don Juan DeMarco. She is married to actor Christopher Thompson and has two children. In 2003 she was the main presenter at the César Awards ceremony. Géraldine_Pailhas ( born_8_January_1971 ) is a_French_actress . She had her_first_international_success in 1995 as Doña_Anna , the_unfulfilled_love of Johnny_Depp in the_comedy_Don_Juan_DeMarco . She is_married to actor_Christopher_Thompson and has two_children . In 2003 she was the_main_presenter at the_César_Awards_ceremony .
